name: Credal.ai
headline: Build Intelligent Internal Assistants
description: Give any employee the power to build AI Assistants that understand your Enterprise's people, data and tools. Security, access controls and compliance built in.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:api; industry:cybersecurity; industry:enterprise; industry:ai; location:new-york

founders.name: Ravin Thambapillai, Founder
founders.description:
I hanker after an honorable Goddam skull. I worked at Google, TheHutGroup (now THG) at Series A, GoCardless at Series A, and most recently at Palantir for 7 years, where I led the building of significant parts of America's emergency-public-health infrastructure, including what Atlantic Magazine called "America's most reliable Pandemic data."

My principles are listed here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/11-yFsiwOgYDUmHSWe8J0B2RU2a0JbO2yYUwqM2fjDbE

founders.name: Jack Fischer, Founder
founders.description:
Five years at Palantir in various technical capacities on projects ranging from airline reliability to defense computer vision. Palantir's US commercial hiring manager 2020-2022. 
Worked on several of the precursors to H1 (YC W20) and developed their early entity resolution algorithms.
Now enabling secure AI!

# Custom AI Agents with your data, tools, and expertise.
Reach 90% AI adoption with measurable ROI, by embedding custom AI Agents into the tools and processes you already run today.
[Get Started](https://credal.ai/</get-started>)
Powering both large enterprises and scaling startups
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/670e99383b3c0c8650488107_Wise.svg)](https://credal.ai/<https:/wise.com>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/670e99fad653d185907a77a4_MongoDB.svg)](https://credal.ai/<https:/www.mongodb.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/670e993854c4470645d027b1_Lattice.svg)](https://credal.ai/<https:/lattice.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/670e9938df3d5911f9ef9498_IFRS.svg)](https://credal.ai/<https:/www.ifrs.org>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/670e993864ed2960e0210006_Checkr.svg)](https://credal.ai/<https:/checkr.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/670e99b10984fc25a0b3b2d1_Altana.svg)](https://credal.ai/<https:/altana.ai/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/670e9938b78b7b0828bbd984_Incident.svg)](https://credal.ai/<https:/incident.io/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/670e99383b3c0c86504880cf_Gecko.svg)](https://credal.ai/<https:/www.geckorobotics.com>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/670e99386fbf8fc1bbb2d379_Moneyhub.svg)](https://credal.ai/<https:/www.moneyhub.com>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/670e993995be1572f3ae73cc_Sourceful.svg)](https://credal.ai/<https:/www.sourceful.com/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f49a81a45a0c4feab9d9ec_productMicro_integrate.svg)
Integrate
Pull data from any source
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f49c21cdde0af76929b6ee_productMicro_secure.svg)
Secure
Inherit & enforce access controls
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f49c20766cb23a11de7c96_productMicro_search.svg)
Search
Find anything across your data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f49c20544bd21f10773fd3_productMicro_code.svg)
Code
Flexible and secure API
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f49c204e092775d86cb625_productMicro_pointAndClick.svg)
Point & click
Create AI copilots to do anything
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f49e542d798b8658c94f71_diagram_integrate.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/66282562282f4584f9709b92_background.svg)
Synchronize Permissions
Audit Access
Redact PII
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f9a9dfc74870601c1e3878_permissions.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/662826b974d122557da3ed29_audit.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/66282c3216e022ed56bc6582_Group%2034.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f9a2ada9ce599aa58b8684_Browser%20%E2%80%94%20Search.svg)
sendMessage
Send a message to a co-pilot
uploadDocumentUrl
Upload a document via its url
createDocumentCollection
Create a collection of related documents with shared data
listAuthorizedResources
List resources that the user is authorized to do actions on
searchDocumentCatalog
Search across all documents
Post
/v0/copilots/sendMessage
/v0/catalog/uploadDocumentUrl
/v0/documentCollections/createDocumentCollection
/v0/permissions/listAuthorizedResources
/v0/search/searchDocumentCatalog
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/copilots/sendMessage
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "message": "Do we support Hubspot import?", 
> "userEmail": "marcelo@acne.ai", 
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/catalog/uploadDocumentUrl
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "documentUrl": "https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QFOA0lgNycFmdZJQr", 
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/documentCollections/createDocumentCollection
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "collectionName": "Customer Meeting Transcripts", 
> "embeddingsModel": "text-embedding-ada-002", 
> "distanceMetric": "EUCLIDEAN", 
> "customMetadataSchema": {
> "fields": [
> { "name": "customerName", "type": "STRING" },
> { "name": "meetingDate", "type": "STRING" },
> ]
> }
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/permissions/listAuthorizedResources
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "action": "READ"
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/search/searchDocumentCatalog
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "searchQuery": "ABC Corp",
> "searchOptions": {
> "maxResults": 5
> }
> }'
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f9a30b96c44939ca191fe0_PointandClick%20.svg)
Featured In
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f463a856ef72f8fd942186_logo_tc.png)](https://credal.ai/<https:/techcrunch.com/2023/10/26/credal-aims-to-connect-company-data-to-llms-securely/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f463a8e8619be24c5fd872_logo_IPE.png)](https://credal.ai/<https:/www.ipe.com/asset-class-reports/ai-moving-from-innovation-to-early-adoption/10070393.article>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f463a8db507b3b788bd437_logo_siliconAngle.png)](https://credal.ai/<https:/siliconangle.com/2023/10/26/credal-datasaur-target-enterprise-demand-security-optimized-ai-models/>)
Compatible with
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f31766a6ce645d67f3b67a_image%203.png)](https://credal.ai/<https:/openai.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f31766f2439cc71dead63f_Group%203.png)](https://credal.ai/<https:/www.anthropic.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f3176654853c97ec16265d_image%204.png)](https://credal.ai/<https:/cohere.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/6630148f9004ce7fc9597679_MongoDB_Logomark_ForestGreen%201.png)](https://credal.ai/<https:/www.mongodb.com/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65fa168530cc16330024f3b9_Integrate%20Badge.svg)
## Connect your company's data securely
Point & click integration makes it easy to get started
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/66eb3cc9f458b189abfb3b57_65f4670c3bea3bc2016aff5f_diagram_integrations.svg)
### Pre-built data connectors
Connect Credal with Slack, GSuite, Notion, Microsoft, Salesforce, Confluence, and more - instantly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Sync permissions from source systems
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Fully configurable (cloud vs. on prem, etc.)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Enterprise RAG, search, & chat functionality on day 1
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4671a5b0308419e30c3ef_diagram_customIntegrations.svg)
### Custom data connectors
Many enterprises have custom or proprietary data sources they want to connect LLMs to. Credal solves this.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Real-time sync, including permissioning
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Supports all common file functions (JSON, XML, CSV...)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Manage ETL pipelines, scheduling, and config in our UI
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468ed47448cdea2499623_product_secure_white.svg)
## Deploy generative AI with full security and compliance
Credal makes it easy to inherit and sync permissions, audit data access, and safeguard PII from touching models.
### Permissions
Credal synchronizes permissions across all source systems, ensuring no data leakage and full compliance for your company’s use of generative AI.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Sync permissions from all source systems
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Automatically update permissions cache in real-time, synced with SSO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Granular and configurable access controls
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4708fe59a986a6e076706_diagram_permissions.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4708fe59a986a6e076706_diagram_permissions.svg)
### Auto Redaction
Credal can automatically replace PII with placeholders before passing it to third-party modules. Then, Credal can restore PII by swapping out the placeholders.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Prevent leakage of PHI, PII, and PCI with high accuracy
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Protect secrets, API keys, & credentials - improving your security posture
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Helps you stay compliant with HIPAA
### Comprehensive Audit Capabilities
Full audit logging for generative AI in your business, including prompts, data and responses.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Stay compliant and secure
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Review organizational use of AI models to improve your business
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Integrates with Splunk, Prometheus, Datadog and more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f47183c6c9ff00c6ec4063_diagram_audit.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4727b058abefb5b4a96d8_framesDiagram_soc2.svg)
### SOC 2 + GDPR + CCPA compliant
Credal infrastructure is SOC 2 Type 2 compliant, tested and verified
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4727b855c336c73dad31c_framesDiagram_cloud.svg)
### Cloud + On Premise
We support both on premise and cloud deployments. Deploy Credal in the way that works best for your business.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4727bc1f45e764af22c96_framesDiagram_aup.svg)
### Enforce Acceptable Use Policies
Upload your policies and breathe easy: oversight, auditing and alerting for your IT team are built into Credal
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f474052ba41fbbe6159cb2_product_search.svg)
## The only end-to-end enterprise RAG platform
Credal is the fastest way to build secure, access-controlled Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) applications on top of your data. Supports semantic, keyword, or hybrid search.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Point-and-click integrations to all your source systems out of the box
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Automatic, near-real-time data refreshing with permissions build in
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Use AI however you want: chat UI, enterprise search, or our developer API
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f47450f9eb362af6ee4226_diagram_documents.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/6602567a448e131d0e970812_code.svg)
## Build AI-powered applications using our flexible API
Credal’s simple REST API enables developers to build and deploy apps seamlessly. Discover our [documentation](https://credal.ai/<http:/docs.credal.ai>).
sendMessage
Send a message to a co-pilot
uploadDocumentUrl
Upload a document via its url
createDocumentCollection
Create a collection of related documents with shared data
listAuthorizedResources
List resources that the user is authorized to do actions on
searchDocumentCatalog
Search across all documents
Post
/v0/copilots/sendMessage
/v0/catalog/uploadDocumentUrl
/v0/documentCollections/createDocumentCollection
/v0/permissions/listAuthorizedResources
/v0/search/searchDocumentCatalog
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/copilots/sendMessage
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "message": "Do we support Hubspot import?", 
> "userEmail": "marcelo@acne.ai", 
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/catalog/uploadDocumentUrl
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "documentUrl": "https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QFOA0lgNycFmdZJQr", 
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/documentCollections/createDocumentCollection
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "collectionName": "Customer Meeting Transcripts", 
> "embeddingsModel": "text-embedding-ada-002", 
> "distanceMetric": "EUCLIDEAN", 
> "customMetadataSchema": {
> "fields": [
> { "name": "customerName", "type": "STRING" },
> { "name": "meetingDate", "type": "STRING" },
> ]
> }
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/permissions/listAuthorizedResources
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "action": "READ"
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/search/searchDocumentCatalog
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "searchQuery": "ABC Corp",
> "searchOptions": {
> "maxResults": 5
> }
> }'
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f476cc2419a8d81c56b64a_frameDiagram_models.svg)
### Supports multiple models
One API integration gets you the latest models from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google and more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f476d89ccdfd912c13a54f_frameDiagram_multimodal.svg)
### Fully interoperable and multimodal
Drop-in support for common endpoints such as text/chat completions, images, and popular libraries such as LangChain
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f476e53eb1b6bef601e744_frameDiagram_secure.svg)
### Secure and performant
Focus on building your apps; Credal takes care of performance, cost, and security logging automatically
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f48c781912103acdf93bf7_misc_buildUI_topSection.svg)
## Build AI tooling using Copilots
Credal includes pre-built UI frameworks and low-code / no-code tooling. Implement workflows without developer support.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f48d9a5648396c935c071d_misc_buildUI_middleSection.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f9ac0bb0443a50543d2f81_diagram_chooseModel.svg)
Pick your model, data, and prompt
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f48fa1c137d8d2331c1f73_diagram_slack.svg)
Deploy your Copilot wherever your team works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f9a51a3316f3cbef942dcc_diagram_checkBoxes.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f490afae0fc691f3670b13_diagram_technicalSupport.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4a1d9e68310dc9f039ab2_diagram_antiMoneyLaundering.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4a1ea216fff683b061a4a_diagram_incidentTimelineBot.svg)
Configure UI for your Copilots
Examples:
IT Support Bot
AML Assistant
Incident Timeline Bot
## Credal is loved by customers
Discover Credal's success stories
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/678f58b67dbe1215b918b368_image_2025-01-21_022005577.png)
### "It’s rare to find an AI tool that actually delivers immediate business impact, but Credal does. The team are incredible partners and have helped us achieve far above market AI adoption: 85% of our entire organization is now on board, and it's one of the most loved tools we have."
Naeem Ishaq
Chief Financial Officer, Checkr
[Read the full case study →](https://credal.ai/</case-studies/checkr-case-study>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f49526f9eb362af60b6216_misc_icons.svg)
## Building blocks towards secure AI apps
Credal gives you everything you need to supercharge your business using generative AI, securely.
Ready to dive in?
[Get Started](https://credal.ai/</get-started>)

sendMessage
Send a message to a co-pilot
uploadDocumentUrl
Upload a document via its url
createDocumentCollection
Create a collection of related documents with shared data
listAuthorizedResources
List resources that the user is authorized to do actions on
searchDocumentCatalog
Search across all documents
Post
/v0/copilots/sendMessage
/v0/catalog/uploadDocumentUrl
/v0/documentCollections/createDocumentCollection
/v0/permissions/listAuthorizedResources
/v0/search/searchDocumentCatalog
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/copilots/sendMessage
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "message": "Do we support Hubspot import?", 
> "userEmail": "marcelo@acne.ai", 
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/catalog/uploadDocumentUrl
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "documentUrl": "https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QFOA0lgNycFmdZJQr", 
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/documentCollections/createDocumentCollection
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "collectionName": "Customer Meeting Transcripts", 
> "embeddingsModel": "text-embedding-ada-002", 
> "distanceMetric": "EUCLIDEAN", 
> "customMetadataSchema": {
> "fields": [
> { "name": "customerName", "type": "STRING" },
> { "name": "meetingDate", "type": "STRING" },
> ]
> }
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/permissions/listAuthorizedResources
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "action": "READ"
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/search/searchDocumentCatalog
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "searchQuery": "ABC Corp",
> "searchOptions": {
> "maxResults": 5
> }
> }'

## Connect your company's data securely
Point & click integration makes it easy to get started
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/66eb3cc9f458b189abfb3b57_65f4670c3bea3bc2016aff5f_diagram_integrations.svg)
### Pre-built data connectors
Connect Credal with Slack, GSuite, Notion, Microsoft, Salesforce, Confluence, and more - instantly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Sync permissions from source systems
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Fully configurable (cloud vs. on prem, etc.)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Enterprise RAG, search, & chat functionality on day 1
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4671a5b0308419e30c3ef_diagram_customIntegrations.svg)
### Custom data connectors
Many enterprises have custom or proprietary data sources they want to connect LLMs to. Credal solves this.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Real-time sync, including permissioning
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Supports all common file functions (JSON, XML, CSV...)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Manage ETL pipelines, scheduling, and config in our UI
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468ed47448cdea2499623_product_secure_white.svg)
## Deploy generative AI with full security and compliance
Credal makes it easy to inherit and sync permissions, audit data access, and safeguard PII from touching models.
### Permissions
Credal synchronizes permissions across all source systems, ensuring no data leakage and full compliance for your company’s use of generative AI.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Sync permissions from all source systems
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Automatically update permissions cache in real-time, synced with SSO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Granular and configurable access controls
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4708fe59a986a6e076706_diagram_permissions.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4708fe59a986a6e076706_diagram_permissions.svg)
### Auto Redaction
Credal can automatically replace PII with placeholders before passing it to third-party modules. Then, Credal can restore PII by swapping out the placeholders.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Prevent leakage of PHI, PII, and PCI with high accuracy
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Protect secrets, API keys, & credentials - improving your security posture
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Helps you stay compliant with HIPAA
### Comprehensive Audit Capabilities
Full audit logging for generative AI in your business, including prompts, data and responses.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Stay compliant and secure
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Review organizational use of AI models to improve your business
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Integrates with Splunk, Prometheus, Datadog and more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f47183c6c9ff00c6ec4063_diagram_audit.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4727b058abefb5b4a96d8_framesDiagram_soc2.svg)
### SOC 2 + GDPR + CCPA compliant
Credal infrastructure is SOC 2 Type 2 compliant, tested and verified
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4727b855c336c73dad31c_framesDiagram_cloud.svg)
### Cloud + On Premise
We support both on premise and cloud deployments. Deploy Credal in the way that works best for your business.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f4727bc1f45e764af22c96_framesDiagram_aup.svg)
### Enforce Acceptable Use Policies
Upload your policies and breathe easy: oversight, auditing and alerting for your IT team are built into Credal
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f474052ba41fbbe6159cb2_product_search.svg)
## The only end-to-end enterprise RAG platform
Credal is the fastest way to build secure, access-controlled Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) applications on top of your data. Supports semantic, keyword, or hybrid search.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Point-and-click integrations to all your source systems out of the box
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Automatic, near-real-time data refreshing with permissions build in
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f468133da99591f7cae619_misc_check.svg)
Use AI however you want: chat UI, enterprise search, or our developer API
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f47450f9eb362af6ee4226_diagram_documents.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/6602567a448e131d0e970812_code.svg)
## Build AI-powered applications using our flexible API
Credal’s simple REST API enables developers to build and deploy apps seamlessly. Discover our documentation⟨38⟩.
sendMessage
Send a message to a co-pilot
uploadDocumentUrl
Upload a document via its url
createDocumentCollection
Create a collection of related documents with shared data
listAuthorizedResources
List resources that the user is authorized to do actions on
searchDocumentCatalog
Search across all documents
Post
/v0/copilots/sendMessage
/v0/catalog/uploadDocumentUrl
/v0/documentCollections/createDocumentCollection
/v0/permissions/listAuthorizedResources
/v0/search/searchDocumentCatalog
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/copilots/sendMessage
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "message": "Do we support Hubspot import?", 
> "userEmail": "marcelo@acne.ai", 
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/catalog/uploadDocumentUrl
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "documentUrl": "https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QFOA0lgNycFmdZJQr", 
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/documentCollections/createDocumentCollection
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "collectionName": "Customer Meeting Transcripts", 
> "embeddingsModel": "text-embedding-ada-002", 
> "distanceMetric": "EUCLIDEAN", 
> "customMetadataSchema": {
> "fields": [
> { "name": "customerName", "type": "STRING" },
> { "name": "meetingDate", "type": "STRING" },
> ]
> }
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/permissions/listAuthorizedResources
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "action": "READ"
> }'
$ curl -X POST https://api.credal.ai/api/v0/search/searchDocumentCatalog
> -H "Authorization: Bearer <apiKey>" \
> -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
> -d '{
> "searchQuery": "ABC Corp",
> "searchOptions": {
> "maxResults": 5
> }
> }'
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f476cc2419a8d81c56b64a_frameDiagram_models.svg)
### Supports multiple models
One API integration gets you the latest models from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google and more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f476d89ccdfd912c13a54f_frameDiagram_multimodal.svg)
### Fully interoperable and multimodal
Drop-in support for common endpoints such as text/chat completions, images, and popular libraries such as LangChain
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f476e53eb1b6bef601e744_frameDiagram_secure.svg)
### Secure and performant
Focus on building your apps; Credal takes care of performance, cost, and security logging automatically
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f30a04a926c4ab669afe03/65f48c781912103acdf93bf7_misc_buildUI_topSection.svg)

generated_description:
**Credal.ai: Your Go-To for Intelligent Internal Assistants**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from Y Combinator's W23 batch, Credal.ai is making waves from its New York base. With a compact team of eight, they’re laser-focused on a compelling mission: building intelligent internal assistants that give employees the power to create AI tools tailored to their company’s specific needs.

The foundation of Credal's offering is impressive. They equip users—regardless of their tech expertise—with the capability to design AI assistants that seamlessly integrate with existing enterprise systems, respect security protocols, and uphold compliance standards.

### What They Do

Credal is innovating in several areas:

1. **Self-Service AI Agents**: Users can create their own AI tools to enhance productivity without heavy reliance on IT.
2. **Workplace Search**: This allows for efficient searching across company documents and databases.
3. **Developer RAG Platform**: A robust platform enabling developers to build secure and efficient AI applications.

They’re not just about cutting-edge products; Credal is also committed to compliance. Their infrastructure is SOC 2 compliant, which is essential for enterprises handling sensitive data.

### Why Credal?

The real magic of Credal lies in its ease of integration. With point-and-click functionality, companies can connect it to popular tools like Slack, Google Workspace, and Salesforce without the hassle. Whether you're a large enterprise or a scaling startup, Credal aligns well with different business sizes and models, promising a high adoption rate and measurable ROI on AI investments.

### Current Focus Areas

Credal’s offerings can significantly enhance various business functions, including:

- **IT and Operations**
- **Sales**
- **Human Resources**
- **Customer Support**

The company touts impressive case studies, including partnerships with brands like Checkr, where they've seen AI adoption rates soar to 85%, showcasing their effective approach.

### In Short

Credal.ai represents a leap forward in making AI accessible and secure for enterprises. It's not just about technology; it's about crafting tools that empower employees to harness their own data, transforming how businesses operate. If you're looking to innovate within your organization and bolster productivity, Credal.ai might just be the partner you need.

For more information, check out their website at [credal.ai](https://credal.ai).
